text: Ginevra de' Benci is an oil on wood painting by Leonardo da Vinci. The painting was made by Leonardo between 1479 and 1480. It hangs in the National Gallery of Art in Washington, D.C. It is the only Leonardo painting on view in the United States. Category:Paintings by Leonardo da Vinci Category:15th- century paintings
title: Ginevra de' Benci
